statements: SELECT * FROM WineInventory
SELECT wine_name, quantity FROM WineInventory WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM WineInventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT id, wine_name, vintage FROM WineInventory ORDER BY vintage DESC
SELECT supplier, COUNT(id) as total_wines FROM WineInventory GROUP BY supplier HAVING total_wines > 5
SELECT * FROM WineInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY vintage DESC, wine_name ASC
SELECT id, wine_name, quantity FROM WineInventory WHERE supplier = 'WineCo' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM WineInventory WHERE supplier = 'VineyardX' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY id
SELECT wine_name, supplier FROM WineInventory WHERE vintage > 2015 AND quantity < 10 ORDER BY wine_name
SELECT * FROM WineInventory WHERE vintage < 2000 AND supplier LIKE '%Imports%' ORDER BY supplier, vintage DESC
SELECT * FROM WineInventory WHERE vintage > 2010;
SELECT wine_name, quantity FROM WineInventory WHERE supplier='ABC Wines';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE location='France';
SELECT wine_name, quantity, supplier FROM WineInventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM WineInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY wine_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT wine_name, vintage, quantity FROM WineInventory WHERE supplier='ABC Wines' ORDER BY vintage DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT wine_name, quantity, supplier FROM WineInventory WHERE quantity <= 20 AND supplier='XYZ Wines';
SELECT * FROM WineInventory INNER JOIN Suppliers ON WineInventory.supplier = Suppliers.supplier_name ORDER BY WineInventory.wine_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wine_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, vintage, quantity FROM wine_inventory WHERE vintage >= 2000 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier, quantity FROM wine_inventory WHERE supplier LIKE 'A%' AND quantity < 20;
SELECT id, vintage, supplier FROM wine_inventory WHERE vintage BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, vintage, quantity, supplier FROM wine_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY vintage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, contact_phone FROM wine_suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, wine_id, reviewer_name, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, reviewer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, address FROM wine_suppliers WHERE name IN ('Winery A', 'Winery B', 'Winery C') ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, vintage, quantity, supplier FROM wine_inventory WHERE supplier LIKE '%Wine%' OR quantity < 5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM wine_bottles;
SELECT id, vintage, quantity FROM wine_bottles ORDER BY vintage DESC;
SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.location, wine_bottles.quantity FROM suppliers JOIN wine_bottles ON suppliers.id = wine_bottles.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.location = 'France';
SELECT vintages.year, inventory.price FROM vintages JOIN inventory ON vintages.id = inventory.wine_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 10 ORDER BY vintages.year ASC;
SELECT wine_type, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM vintages JOIN inventory ON vintages.id = inventory.wine_id GROUP BY wine_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_bottles WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY vintage ASC;

SELECT suppliers.name, vintages.year, inventory.quantity FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.id = inventory.wine_id JOIN vintages ON inventory.wine_id = vintages.id WHERE suppliers.location = 'France';
SELECT wine_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory JOIN vintages ON inventory.wine_id = vintages.id GROUP BY wine_type;

SELECT suppliers.name, vintages.year, SUM(inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.id = inventory.wine_id JOIN vintages ON inventory.wine_id = vintages.id GROUP BY suppliers.name, vintages.year HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT suppliers.name AS supplier_name, vintages.year, inventory.quantity AS available_quantity, inventory.price AS unit_price FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.id = inventory.wine_id JOIN vintages ON inventory.wine_id = vintages.id WHERE suppliers.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY vintages.year DESC;
SELECT * FROM bottles;
SELECT id, vintage, supplier_id FROM bottles WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT grape_variety, region FROM wine_types WHERE region = 'Italy';
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bottles WHERE vintage > 2010 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, grape_variety FROM wine_types WHERE region='California' LIMIT 5;
SELECT b.id, b.vintage, b.quantity, s.name AS supplier_name FROM bottles b JOIN suppliers s ON b.supplier_id = s.id WHERE s.location='France';
SELECT p.id, p.quantity, p.purchase_date, t.total_amount FROM purchases p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.purchase_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';

SELECT s.name AS supplier, COUNT(p.id) AS total_purchases FROM suppliers s JOIN transactions t ON s.id = t.supplier_id JOIN purchases p ON t.purchase_id = p.id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
